modName: Skyrim LegoManIAm94s Patches And Master Mod Addons
summary: This page has all of the patches from mods I made.
descriptionHtml:
This page has all of the patches from mods I have made that conflict with two or more of my own mods. It also have mod addons which require two or more of my mods to add features of mod A to mod B and so forth. Read below to find out details on each mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1020/?]here[/url].


[size=2][b]Civil War Commander And Extended[/b][/size]

If you want to use my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77142/?]Civil War Commander [/url]and my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75499/?]Civil War Extended[/url] do not use those two mods together. Instead download the Civil War Commander And Extended mod here which merges the two mods and make them compatible with one another.

Requirements
Skyrim

[size=2]H[b]earthfire Roads Rowboats[/b][/size]

This patch is only if you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url]and it will fix the world map so all the roads will appear.

Requirements
Skyrim
Hearthfire
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74941?]Hearthfire Roads[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76240?]Rowboats[/url]
author: LegoManIAm94
